content: I've been eyeing a new necklace on a popular online jewelry retailer's website since Christmas, and I finally treated myself to it on February 5th. However, the chain is shorter than I expected, so I'll need to exchange it for a longer one. Can you help me with the exchange process or guide me through their customer service number? By the way, I purchase a silver cuff from a boutique store online recently, on February 15th, and it's been my go-to accessory lately.
